code: @Test public void verifyRouteContext() {     assertThat("Route context is incorrect!", routes, hasSize(1)).     RouteDefinition route = routes.get(0).     assertThat("Route input is incorrect!", route.getInputs(), hasSize(1)).     assertThat("Route is incorrect!", route.getInputs().get(0).getEndpointUri(), is(equalTo("direct:inbound"))). }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound() throws InterruptedException {     outbound.expectedMessageCount(1).     outbound.expectedBodiesReceived("Response to message").     inbound.sendBody("message").     assertIsSatisfied(2L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, outbound). }
